summary: Female breton Fynn (Lvl 1) from the outro of the Skyrim Mods Series
descriptionHtml:
[b]Update 1.0c[/b]:
Removed a lot of mods from the load order of the save game. Shouldn\'t crash anymore because of many loaded mods that you don\'t have. Active files are now: Skyrim.esm, Update.esm, ApachiiSkyHair.esm (since its essencial for the hair).

[center][img]http://www.skyrimmodsreviews.com/skyrimnexus/fynn/fynn.png[/img]
[youtube]5lrYczdCzfY[/youtube][/center]

This is a save game with the character Fynn from the outro of my Skyrim Mods Series. She is a breton and a new character on Lvl 1. You start in front of Riverwood and can do the main quest normally, but if you visit Helgen it is not burned down (I never planned on uploading this, this character was made by coc\'ing into the Review Studio mod. Because of that it took me a whole day to figure out the console commands to start the main quest...). I optimized her a little bit, however: If you start the game, you can simply use the console command showracemenu to adjust her. Since she\'s Level 1 it won\'t have effects on her stats (though you shouldn\'t change the race if you want to use her. Wouldn\'t make sense).

[color=red]I\'m uploading this because some people wanted to have this character for their own gameplay.[/color]

To get the look of this character you will need a bunch of mods that I\'m using. Also if you load the save game it will say that some content is missing etc., but that shouldn\'t be a problem. I don\'t know which mods I used beside for the character creation for this character.

[b]Mods for the same look:[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females by Bella by BellaGail[/url] (+ Less Make up Version 2)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12732]Eye colours with new style Eyelashes by Radioragae[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11447]Feminine Running and New Dash Animation by xp32[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13272]Victorias High Heel walk Animation plus BBP by xp32[/url]

Robe from the pictures:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14198]Field Mage Outfit CBBEv3 Echo by Echo 1162[/url]
UNP conversion for this robe:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18787]Field Mage Outfit by Echo 1162 UNP remesh BBP by turbosundance[/url]

ENBs used for the screenshots:
Midhrastic ENB v2.2 WIP ([url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20429/\"]current mod here[/url])
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11318]Superb ENB-RL[/url]

[b]Installation[/b]

Simply unpack the downloaded zip file, take and place the .ess file in your save game folder of your Skyrim (for me: My Documents -> My Games -> Skyrim -> Saves).

[b]Thanks[/b]
to Echo for the mage outfit
to turbosundance for the unp remesh of the mage outfit
to all the great modder who are polishing the game
the skyrimnexus, Bethesda
and all my viewer on YouTube :D
author: SaioTV
